start_message:

help_message:
/start - welcome message and bot version
/gpt request - ChatGPT request
/draw request - draw a picture with DALLE
/reset - reset ChatGPT history
/queue - show requests queue
gpt_no_text: Empty request, choomba!\n\nExample: /gpt Write a song about OpenAI
draw_no_text: Empty request, choomba!\n\nExample: /draw An eco-friendly computer from the 90s in the style of vaporwave
gpt_no_message: Empty request, choomba!\n\nExample: Write a song about OpenAI
queue_overflow: Queue is full. Try again later
gpt_error: Error: {0}\n\nMake another request or try again later =(
